price: Ubutagatifu ni ubwa Nyagasani w’ibirere n’isi, Nyagasani nyiri Ar’shi! [1] Nta ho ahuriye n’ibyo bamwitirira.
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
footnotes: [1] Reba uko twasobanuye iri jambo muri Suratul A’araf, Aya ya 54.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
